title: US and China agree to 90-day trade truce extension
description: The United States and China agreed to pause tariff hikes on each other’s goods for an additional 90 days, according to an executive order signed by President Donald Trump on Monday. CNN’s Kristie Lu Stout breaks down the latest.
content:
US and China agree to 90-day trade truce extension The United States and China agreed to pause tariff hikes on each other’s goods for an additional 90 days, according to an executive order signed by President Donald Trump on Monday. CNN's Kristie Lu Stout breaks down the latest. US and China agree to 90-day trade truce extension

An explosion Monday at a US Steel coking plant near Pittsburgh has left people trapped under the rubble, with emergency workers on site trying to rescue them, an official said.

This city could be part of a Trump-Putin deal The city of Kramatorsk is at the frontline of Ukraine's war with Russia. The capital city of Donetsk, that Russia occupies, may play a part in upcoming talks between US President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska on Friday. CNN's Chief Security Correspondent Nick Paton Walsh visits the city as Ukrainians arrive from Kyiv. This city could be part of a Trump-Putin deal

Hundreds of prisoners from the Nebraska State Penitentiary were displaced after a violent storm damaged two housing units on Saturday, according to the Nebraska Department of Correctional Services. No injuries were reported, the department said.

David Rose, a DeKalb County Police officer, was killed in the CDC shooting in Atlanta, leaving behind a pregnant wife and two children. Rose gave a graduation speech to his fellow cadets at the DeKalb County Police Department’s Academy Class 138 in March, 2025.

Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese announced on Monday that Australia will recognize a Palestinian state at the General Assembly of the United Nations in September. Australia joins the UK, France and Canada in announcing plans to recognize a Palestinian state. The move leaves the US increasingly isolated from some of its closest allies in its defense of Israel’s escalating military campaign that’s decimated the besieged enclave after almost two years of war.

A 14-year-old boy was killed by an airdropped aid package in Gaza on Saturday, according to Al-Awda hospital. The UN has warned that airdrops of aid are ineffective, expensive and dangerous in heavily populated areas.

Inside the growing influence of a Christian nationalist pastor in the new Trump administration Douglas Wilson, a self-described Christian nationalist pastor, advocates for the idea that America should adopt a Christian theocracy and adhere to a biblical interpretation of society. On the fringes of the religious right for decades, Wilson has found an increasingly mainstream Republican audience under President Donald Trump. CNN's Pamela Brown reports from Moscow, Idaho where Wilson's Christ Church movement is based. Inside the growing influence of a Christian nationalist pastor in the new Trump administration
summary: The United States and China have agreed to extend a 90-day trade truce to allow for further tariff hikes on each other's goods. This follows an explosion at a US Steel coking plant near Pittsburgh that left people trapped under the rubble. The city of Kramatorsk, Ukraine's capital, may be part of a deal between US President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin. Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese announced that Australia will recognize a Palestinian state at the General Assembly of the United Nations in September. A 14-year-old boy was killed by an airdropped aid package in Gaza on Saturday, prompting the UN to warn against such airstropping.
shortSummary: US and China agreed to extend their trade truce for 90 days, amid safety concerns at a Pittsburgh steel plant and potential for a Trump-Russia deal.

argos_summary: The United States and China have agreed to extend their trade truce for an additional 90 days, pausing tariff increases on each other's goods. In other news, an explosion at a US Steel coking plant near Pittsburgh has trapped individuals under rubble, while a violent storm has displaced prisoners in Nebraska. Additionally, Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese announced plans to recognize a Palestinian state, further isolating the US in its support for Israel amid ongoing conflict.
